modName: Arcane Enchanter - No wax on surface
summary:
Two versions:
1. Removes wax remains from the table surface
2. Removes all candles and dripping wax
descriptionHtml:
The molten wax on the table surface looks really ugly, so i removed it. While i was at it, i removed all candles, this is a seperate file.

Installation:
Extract the contents of the zip file to your Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/ folder, overwrite files if asked.

The candles on the screenshot have a new texture, from this mod:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2144]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2144[/url]

The granite surface is from my other mod:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1882]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1882[/url]
author: Volek
